com.gemstone.gemfire.cache.query

Class MultiIndexCreationException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.gemstone.gemfire.cache.query.MultiIndexCreationException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class MultiIndexCreationException
extends Exception
    Consists a map of index names and Exceptions thrown during index creation using QueryService.createDefinedIndexes(). An Index could throw one of the following exceptions:
    • IndexNameConflictException
    • IndexExistsException
    • IndexInvalidException
    • UnsupportedOperationException
    Since:
    8.1
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
